name: part_002
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Da Vinci no Kokuhaku'. Shiranui Flare performs in a cherry blossom park at sunset.
Transition scene with a fade to black, followed by the appearance of Shiranui Flare on a live stage.
MC segment where Shiranui Flare greets the audience and builds excitement for the next song.
Performance of the song 'Smile and Go!!!' on a large concert stage with a digital backdrop.

subtitles.original: ...ってさせて
subtitles.english: ...let me do that

subtitles.original: このままだれにも会わないでいて
subtitles.english: Please don't meet anyone else like this

subtitles.original: ベンチのままに今
subtitles.english: Remaining as a bench now

subtitles.original: It's ordinary love
subtitles.english: It's ordinary love

subtitles.original: 乱数調整なんて当てにならない
subtitles.english: Random number adjustments are unreliable

subtitles.original: 信じられるのは自分だからそりゃそうだろ
subtitles.english: I can only believe in myself, so that makes sense

subtitles.original: 情弱な先入観で三つの地球を
subtitles.english: With weak-information preconceptions, three Earths...

subtitles.original: 凡庸という箱に押し込めて
subtitles.english: ...are pushed into a box called "mediocre"

subtitles.original: 恋したって冷めたら愛なんて忘れるさ
subtitles.english: Even if you're in love, if you cool down, you'll forget about love

subtitles.original: 灰になって後悔したって風に乗って流されて
subtitles.english: Even if you regret turning to ash, you're carried away by the wind

subtitles.original: ハイになって脂肪記事を眺める優越感を
subtitles.english: Getting high and looking at fat articles, a sense of superiority...

subtitles.original: 愛になって教科書に乗ってなんて夢見るの
subtitles.english: ...dreaming of becoming love and appearing in textbooks

subtitles.original: 宣戦布告的正攻法で
subtitles.english: With a declaration of war-like frontal assault

subtitles.original: 融解を創生 法崩壊
subtitles.english: Creating fusion, law collapse

subtitles.original: I'll make you just like you
subtitles.english: I'll make you just like you

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: この世界の片隅誰かが泣いていた
subtitles.english: In a corner of this world, someone was crying

subtitles.original: 無力な自分を見ているようだ
subtitles.english: It's like looking at my powerless self

subtitles.original: この先60年を有意義に生きて
subtitles.english: Live the next 60 years meaningfully

subtitles.original: ベンチのままに今 It's ordinary love
subtitles.english: Remaining as a bench now, it's ordinary love

subtitles.original: こんぬい！準備はいいかー？
subtitles.english: Kon-nui! Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 今日はみんなで騒ぎましょー！せーの！
subtitles.english: Let's make some noise together today! One, two!

subtitles.original: Smile and Go!!!
subtitles.english: Smile and Go!!!

subtitles.original:
Smile and Go!!!
作詞/作曲：桃充花、福嶋あやと
subtitles.english:
Smile and Go!!!
Lyrics/Composition: Momomitsuka, Ayato Fukushima

subtitles.original: やってきましたみんなに会える時間で
subtitles.english: The time has come to meet everyone

subtitles.original: 歌とかゲームとか見て欲しくて
subtitles.english: I want you to see my singing and games

subtitles.original: 配信、見てください！
subtitles.english: Please watch the stream!

subtitles.original: あっという間に過ぎてしまう毎日に
subtitles.english: In the days that pass by in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 乗り遅れないように手繋ごう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands so we don't get left behind

subtitles.original: もっともっと一緒にいよう
subtitles.english: Let's stay together more and more

subtitles.original: 気づけば隣にいてくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for being by my side before I knew it

subtitles.original: どんな高い壁だってひとっ飛びで飛び越えて
subtitles.english: No matter how high the wall, jump over it in one leap

subtitles.original: 誰も見たことない世界にみんなで行こうよ
subtitles.english: Let's all go to a world no one has seen before

subtitles.original: 君とSmile and Go 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile and Go, the one who enjoys it wins

subtitles.original: 君とSmile and Go 弾けたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile and Go, the one who pops wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で集まれば最高でしょ
subtitles.english: It's the best if we gather here with smiles, right?

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile and Go 今全速力で
subtitles.english: We, Smile and Go, now at full speed

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile and Go 遊びまくろうぜ
subtitles.english: We, Smile and Go, let's play to our heart's content

subtitles.original: だってこの日常が大切な宝物だよ
subtitles.english: Because this everyday life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: Smile and Go!!!
subtitles.english: Smile and Go!!!

subtitles.original: 雑談配信今日はまったり行きましょう
subtitles.english: Today's chat stream, let's take it easy

subtitles.original: 他愛ない話聞いてほしくて
subtitles.english: I want you to hear some trivial talk

subtitles.original: 見て見て、ちょっと聞いてよ！
subtitles.english: Look, look, listen for a bit!

subtitles.original: たまにはお休みしようと思ったけれど
subtitles.english: I thought about taking a break once in a while, but...

subtitles.original: やっぱりわちゃわちゃ配信しちゃおっかな
subtitles.english: I guess I'll do a noisy stream after all

subtitles.original: 用意はできた？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: ありふれたこの時も一緒に過ごしたら
subtitles.english: If we spend even this commonplace time together

subtitles.original: いつのまにかキラキラと何よりも輝いて
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it shone more than anything

subtitles.original: 言葉にはできない想いがあふれ出しちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Feelings that can't be put into words are overflowing

subtitles.original: 君とLet's Enjoy 歌ってみようよ
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy, let's try singing

subtitles.original: 君とLet's Enjoy 心は一つに
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy, hearts as one

subtitles.original: そこにいたって優しさは届いてるよ
subtitles.english: Even if you're there, the kindness is reaching me

subtitles.original: 僕らLet's Enjoy テンション上げてさ
subtitles.english: We, Let's Enjoy, let's raise the tension

subtitles.original: 僕らLet's Enjoy はしゃぎまくろうぜ
subtitles.english: We, Let's Enjoy, let's frolic around

subtitles.original: きっと明日はもっと楽しいこと待っているから
subtitles.english: Because surely even more fun things are waiting tomorrow

subtitles.original: みんなー！お披露目盛り上がってますかー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone! Are you getting excited for the reveal!?

subtitles.original: 可愛くなった私を余すところなく...
subtitles.english: Don't miss a single bit of the cuter me...
